turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sony Xperia.
turn.1: What is the difference between a duo and a solo?
turn.2: Sony Xperia  Xperia () is the brand name of smartphones and tablets from Sony Mobile.
turn.3: Where did the name come from?
turn.4: The name Xperia is derived from the word "experience", and was first used in the Xperia X1 tagline, " I Xperia the best".
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Sony Mobile was previously known globally as Sony Ericsson before re-branding in 2012, as a result of the mobile phone manufacturer being taken over and solely owned by Sony. The Xperia X1 was the first phone to be released in the Xperia range.
turn.8: Released 2008, it featured a high resolution display (~311 ppi pixel density) and it was intended to fill the widening gap of smartphones as other competitors were producing high-end smartphone devices such as HTC and Apple.
turn.9: Did they release any other phones?
turn.10: The X2 was released in the following year, which included an 8.1 MP camera and included Wifi and GPS.
turn.12: By this time there was a clear shift towards the smartphone end of the spectrum.
